question:
Match Column-I with Column-II and choose the correct option given below:

| Column-I (Bacteria) | Column-II (Shape) |
|---|---|
| a. Coccus | i. Rod-shaped |
| b. Bacillus | ii. Spiral |
| c. Vibrium | iii. Spherical |
| d. Spirillum | iv. Comma-shaped |
explanation: Coccus bacteria are spherical (iii). Bacillus are rod-shaped (i). Vibrium are comma-shaped (iv). Spirillum are spiral (ii).
